articles.content: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates (AP) An American warship and multiple commercial ships came under attack Sunday in the Red Sea, the Pentagon said. Yemens Houthi rebels later claimed attacks on two ships … [+2686 chars]

articles.title: Kissinger's unwavering support for brutal regimes still haunts Latin America - The Associated Press
